Summary: It was about 20 red flashing lights in da dark sky !!!!!
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was 1030pm in I was getting off wrk @ UMC I just looked in the sky n saw 1 flashing light then 2 ,3,4,5,6, n so on it was about 20 flashing flying lik up n down I call my co worker cuz I knew dey were headed out on da other side n it was three of them in they looked in the sky n saw it to it was so freaky cuz I seen sum lik dat n real life .......
